title: Update Content Standards Request
description: Request parameters for updating an existing content standards configuration. Creates a new version.

standards_id.description: ID of the standards configuration to update

scope.description: Updated scope for where this standards configuration applies

countries_all.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes. Standards apply in ALL listed countries (AND logic).

channels_any.description: Advertising channels. Standards apply to ANY of the listed channels (OR logic).

languages_any.description: BCP 47 language tags (e.g., 'en', 'de', 'fr'). Standards apply to content in ANY of these languages (OR logic). Content in unlisted languages is not covered by these standards.

policy.description: Updated natural language policy describing acceptable and unacceptable content contexts.

calibration_exemplars.description: Updated training/test set to calibrate policy interpretation. Use URL references for pages to be fetched and analyzed, or full artifacts for pre-extracted content.

oneOf.description: URL reference - specific page to fetch and evaluate

type.description: Indicates this is a URL reference

value.description: Full URL to a specific page (e.g., 'https://espn.com/nba/story/_/id/12345/lakers-win')

language.description: BCP 47 language tag for content at this URL

oneOf.description: Full artifact with pre-extracted content (text, images, video, audio)
URL reference - specific page to fetch and evaluate

type.description: Indicates this is a URL reference

value.description: Full URL to a specific page (e.g., 'https://news.example.com/controversial-article')

language.description: BCP 47 language tag for content at this URL

oneOf.description: Full artifact with pre-extracted content (text, images, video, audio)

floor.description: Updated safety floor baseline - a reference to an external floor definition. Floors are typically industry-standard (e.g., GARM categories) or vendor-defined (e.g., IAS, DoubleVerify).

url.description: URL to the floor definition document (e.g., GARM floor, vendor-specific floor)

name.description: Human-readable name for the floor (e.g., 'GARM Brand Safety Floor', 'IAS Brand Safety')

version.description: Version of the floor definition being referenced
